titleStmt.title: Sainct Austines religion collected from his owne writinges & from the confessio[n]s of the learned Protestants, whereby is sufficiently proued and made knowen the like answearable doctrine of the other more auncient fathers of the primitiue church / written by Iohn Brereley.
titleStmt.author: Anderton, James, fl. 1624.
Anderton, Lawrence.

notesStmt.note: Variously attributed to James and Lawrence Anderton.
Imperfect: signatures R-S bound and filmed out of order; tightly bound.
Reproduction of original in the Peterborough Cathedral. Library.
